        title VARCHAR(255),
        season INT,

        duration_in_seconds INT);

CREATE TABLE episode (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
        title VARCHAR(255),
        season INT,

CREATE TABLE user_viewing_history (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
        user_id INT,

DELETE FROM episode WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01' AND id NOT IN (SELECT episode_id FROM user_viewing_history);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE episodes (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_title TEXT,
    season_number INT,
    episode_number INT,
    duration_minutes INT,
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    subscription_type TEXT,
    registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE viewing_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    episode_id INT REFERENCES episodes(episode_id),
    viewing_date TIMESTAMP,
    viewing_duration_minutes INT
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM episodes WHERE episode_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE episodes (
  episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  season INT,
  episode_number INT,
  duration INT,
  release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE series (
  series_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  release_year INT,
  total_seasons INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE viewing_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  episode_id INT,
  date_watched DATE,
  duration_watched INT
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM episodes WHERE episode_id = 1;
